Package uk.co.silentsoftware.ui.listener

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DitherChangedListener
    Interface to notify of change of dither strategy
    OperationFinishedListener
    Generic interface to acknowledge an operation has finished
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutListener
    Opens a message dialog containing the about information
    CustomDropTargetListener
    Custom dnd listener to allow file drop to open preview window.
    FileInputListener
    Listener to show the Image To ZX Spec file input selection dialog
    FileOutputListener
    Listener to show the Image To ZX Spec file output selection dialog
    FileReadyListener
    Listener that wraps the input and output file listeners to provide an indication as to whether it is okay to start processing (i.e.
